name: Into The Dicemension [GMTK JAM 22]
description:
Into the Dicemension is a first person, time-attack platformer with narrative elements. The player is trapped inside of a die which is rolled by the great Mr Dubious. Each roll shifts the world around the player complicating the main goal of hitting a button on every side of the die!

artie: https://frogwizardhat.itch.io/ - Programming

Callax3D: https://callax3d.itch.io/ - 3D artist

Danny: https://twitter.com/dtlestrade - Level Design

Polyrtm: https://polyrtm.itch.io/ - Programming

Luko: https://www.artstation.com/luko3artist - 3D artist

Mr. Alias on Youtube!: https://www.youtube.com/c/MrAlias - Voice Acting

Pie: https://github.com/bcmpinc - Programming

Redencya: https://redencya.itch.io/ - Programming

Vassamo: https://biglink.to/VassamoSocials - Music

DISCLAIMER: Due to technical errors there are only 5 buttons in this version of the project. This is of course a cover up story for Mr. Dubious being bad at math...
